subject: Horse Racing
Agriculture and Farming
Breeding of Animals
lead_paragraph: The Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation, amid an investigation by the New York State attorney general’s office, wants to reduce its herd of 1,100 by about half.
snippet: The Thoroughbred Retirement Foundation, amid an investigation by the New York State attorney general’s office, wants to reduce its herd of 1,100 by about half.
